name: hyperspy-base

package:

build:

  run:

  commands:
    - pip check
    - set MPLBACKEND=agg
  imports:
    - hyperspy
    - hyperspy.Release
    - hyperspy._components

    - hyperspy.api

    - hyperspy.components2d

    - hyperspy.docstrings
    - hyperspy.drawing

    - hyperspy.drawing._widgets
    - hyperspy.events
    - hyperspy.exceptions
    - hyperspy.external
    - hyperspy.external.astropy
    - hyperspy.external.mpfit
    - hyperspy.interactive
    - hyperspy.io
    - hyperspy.io_plugins
    - hyperspy.learn
    - hyperspy.logger
    - hyperspy.misc
    - hyperspy.misc.eds
    - hyperspy.misc.eels
    - hyperspy.misc.holography
    - hyperspy.misc.io
    - hyperspy.misc.machine_learning

    - hyperspy.samfire_utils.weights
    - hyperspy.signal

    - hyperspy.signals

    - hyperspy.utils
  requires:

    - pooch
    - pytest
    - pytest-xdist

extra:
